page.title: 04GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: 1,2,3 Block is like hiding seek someone is it and the rest hide and then the person has to come to get you and if you get there you say 1,2,3 I save crew. Cowpats(3 or more players)The aim is to push people off the playground lines into the imaginary cowpats.After 3 times you are out.Last out is the winner. Long ball requires a large area.Each end requires a semi-circle.The aim is to throw a small ball into your opponents semi-circle and theytry to catch it.to get a point you have to land the ball in your opponents semi-circle.Highest amount of points wins. Manhunt requires two teams of four and two people to be hunted .The hunted people go off (CONT. NEXT PAGE)
